summary: Hamsters are small rodents, with 19 known species. They are popular pets, especially the golden or Syrian hamster. Other common pet hamsters are dwarf species, like Campbell's and Roborovski's. These crepuscular animals are most active at dawn and dusk, staying underground during the day to avoid predators. Their diet consists mainly of seeds, fruits, and plants, with some insects. Hamsters have cheek pouches to carry food, short tails, and furry feet.
title: Hamster
